name: maple-bookmarks
description: Let you navigate smoothly while hiding the bookmark bar.

scripts.bookmark-firefox: cp -R ./bookmark ./bookmark-firefox && cp ./bookmark/manifest_firefox.json ./bookmark-firefox/manifest.json && cd ./bookmark-firefox && zip -r ../dist/FirefoxMaple.zip . && cd .. && rm -rf ./bookmark-firefox
scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist && yarn lint && yarn bookmark && yarn bookmark-firefox && yarn newtab && yarn theme

author: Tw93
